description: Try our easy to follow Creamy Pea And Fetta Soup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pea soup,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Potato,Peanut free
name: Creamy Pea And Fetta Soup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: In a large saucepan over medium heat add oil onion and garlic. Cook for 5 minutes or until onion is softened. Add potatoes and cook for a further 5 minutes.
Add in peas, stock and light evaporated milk. Simmer for 5 minutes or until heated through. Blend mixture until smooth.
Serve in 4 bowls, topped with crumbled feta and snow pea tendrils.
